ygData.msgSnippet: See my Zimel s blades post.  This is the quest you re referring to.  your father is the lady who asked you to seek out the undercover guy. She is back at
ygData.messageBody:
See my Zimel's blades post.� This is the quest you're referring to.�
"your father" is the lady who asked you to seek out the undercover guy.
She is back at the paladin guild on upstairs balcony (outside). sorry
can't remember her name, am at work.
�
hope that helps,
Shawn
